abstract.text: The standard transform matrix used throughout Core Animation.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The transform matrix is used to rotate, scale, translate, skew, and project the layer content. Functions are provided for creating, concatenating, and modifying CATransform3D data.

abstract.text: Render, compose, and animate visual elements.
